title: Club Creation
body: When i try to create a club i type in my desired name and click "create" and absolutely nothing happens. No matter what name i type in it does this, anyone know how to fix this

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you trying to create a club tag or just a club?
[Club tag creation is still disabled afaik.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/AnHEmOh7-club-tag-creation-disabled-and-server-error-message-in-client)
Just trying to make a club, currently im not in any and i wanted to make one of my own but it wont let me
